languages.text: "Это... не то, что я сказал". {n}Хейнрикс со смешком опускает голову.{/n} "Я не ищу ереси или отклонения от Имперского кредо. Я... пытаюсь вести беседу. Узнать, чем ты живешь и что тебя интересует. Насколько хорошо это выходит — можешь судить сама".

traits.locale_text: "Это... не то, что я сказал". {n}Хейнрикс со смешком опускает голову.{/n} "Я не ищу ереси или отклонения от Имперского кредо. Я... пытаюсь вести беседу. Узнать, чем ты живешь и что тебя интересует. Насколько хорошо это выходит — можешь судить сама".

languages.text: "That... isn't what I said." {n}Heinrix looks down with a laugh.{/n} "I'm not looking for heresy or deviations from the Imperial Creed. I'm... trying to have a conversation. To learn about your life and what interests you. You can judge how well it's going for yourself."
languages.original_text: "Это... не то, что я сказал". {n}Хейнрикс со смешком опускает голову.{/n} "Я не ищу ереси или отклонения от Имперского кредо. Я... пытаюсь вести беседу. Узнать, чем ты живешь и что тебя интересует. Насколько хорошо это выходит — можешь судить сама".

traits.locale_text: "That... isn't what I said." {n}Heinrix looks down with a laugh.{/n} "I'm not looking for heresy or deviations from the Imperial Creed. I'm... trying to have a conversation. To learn about your life and what interests you. You can judge how well it's going for yourself."

"That... isn't what I said." {n}Heinrix looks down with a laugh.{/n} "I'm not looking for heresy or deviations from the Imperial Creed. I'm... trying to have a conversation. To learn about your life and what interests you. You can judge how well it's going for yourself."

"That... isn't what I said." {n}Heinrix looks down with a laugh.{/n} "I'm not looking for heresy or deviations from the Imperial Creed. I'm... trying to have a conversation. To learn about your life and what interests you. You can judge how well it's going for yourself."

"That... isn't what I said." {n}Heinrix looks down with a laugh.{/n} "I'm not looking for heresy or deviations from the Imperial Creed. I'm... trying to have a conversation. To learn about your life and what interests you. You can judge how well it's going for yourself."

languages.text: “我……我不是这个意思。”{n}海因里希低下了头，笑了起来。{/n}“我并没打算寻找什么证据，证明谁犯下了异端罪行，或是谁背离了帝国信仰。我……我只是想和你谈谈，了解你的生活与兴趣所在。你可以自行判断我们的谈话是否合你胃口。”
languages.original_text: "That... isn't what I said." {n}Heinrix looks down with a laugh.{/n} "I'm not looking for heresy or deviations from the Imperial Creed. I'm... trying to have a conversation. To learn about your life and what interests you. You can judge how well it's going for yourself."

traits.locale_text: “我……我不是这个意思。”{n}海因里希低下了头，笑了起来。{/n}“我并没打算寻找什么证据，证明谁犯下了异端罪行，或是谁背离了帝国信仰。我……我只是想和你谈谈，了解你的生活与兴趣所在。你可以自行判断我们的谈话是否合你胃口。”

languages.text: «Eso... no es lo que he dicho». {n}Heinrix baja la vista entre risas.{/n} «No estoy buscando herejía ni incumplimiento del Credo imperial. Estoy... intentando conversar. Aprender sobre su vida y sus intereses. Los resultados hablan por sí solos».
languages.original_text: "That... isn't what I said." {n}Heinrix looks down with a laugh.{/n} "I'm not looking for heresy or deviations from the Imperial Creed. I'm... trying to have a conversation. To learn about your life and what interests you. You can judge how well it's going for yourself."

traits.locale_text: «Eso... no es lo que he dicho». {n}Heinrix baja la vista entre risas.{/n} «No estoy buscando herejía ni incumplimiento del Credo imperial. Estoy... intentando conversar. Aprender sobre su vida y sus intereses. Los resultados hablan por sí solos».

languages.text: 「そういう…意味じゃない」{n}ハインリックスは笑いながら下を向く。{/n}「俺は異端であろうとしたり、帝国信条集からの逸脱を求めているのではない。俺は…会話をしようとしているんだ。そっちの人生や興味のあることについて知りたい。どの程度うまくいっているかは、自分で判断すればいい」
languages.original_text: "That... isn't what I said." {n}Heinrix looks down with a laugh.{/n} "I'm not looking for heresy or deviations from the Imperial Creed. I'm... trying to have a conversation. To learn about your life and what interests you. You can judge how well it's going for yourself."

traits.locale_text: 「そういう…意味じゃない」{n}ハインリックスは笑いながら下を向く。{/n}「俺は異端であろうとしたり、帝国信条集からの逸脱を求めているのではない。俺は…会話をしようとしているんだ。そっちの人生や興味のあることについて知りたい。どの程度うまくいっているかは、自分で判断すればいい」

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas... ce que j'ai dit. » {n}Heinrix baisse les yeux en riant.{/n} « Je ne cherche pas particulièrement de signe d'hérésie ou de détournement du Credo Impérial. Je veux juste... discuter, en apprendre davantage sur votre vie et vos centres d'intérêt. À vous de juger si cette conversation se déroule bien ou non. »
languages.original_text: "That... isn't what I said." {n}Heinrix looks down with a laugh.{/n} "I'm not looking for heresy or deviations from the Imperial Creed. I'm... trying to have a conversation. To learn about your life and what interests you. You can judge how well it's going for yourself."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas... ce que j'ai dit. » {n}Heinrix baisse les yeux en riant.{/n} « Je ne cherche pas particulièrement de signe d'hérésie ou de détournement du Crédo Impérial. Je veux juste... discuter, en apprendre davantage sur votre vie et vos centres d'intérêt. À vous de juger si cette conversation se déroule bien ou non. »

languages.text: "Das ... ist nicht das, was ich gesagt habe." {n}Heinrix blickt lachend hinab.{/n} "Ich suche keine Ketzerei oder Abweichungen vom Imperialen Glauben. Ich ... möchte nur ein Gespräch zu führen. Um etwas über Euer Leben zu erfahren und Eure Interessen herauszufinden. Wie gut ich das hinbekomme, müsst Ihr selbst beurteilen."
languages.original_text: "That... isn't what I said." {n}Heinrix looks down with a laugh.{/n} "I'm not looking for heresy or deviations from the Imperial Creed. I'm... trying to have a conversation. To learn about your life and what interests you. You can judge how well it's going for yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Das ... ist nicht das, was ich gesagt habe." {n}Heinrix blickt lachend hinab.{/n} "Ich suche keine Ketzerei oder Abweichungen vom Imperialen Glauben. Ich ... möchte nur ein Gespräch zu führen. Um etwas über Euer Leben zu erfahren und Eure Interessen herauszufinden. Wie gut ich das hinbekomme, müsst Ihr selbst beurteilen."

languages.text: "Ben... Öyle bir şey söylemedim." {n}Heinrix, gülerek yere bakıyor.{/n} "İmparatorluk İtikadı içinde kâfirlik ya da sapma aramıyorum. Ben... Sohbet etmeye, hayatın ve ilgini çeken şeylere dair bir şeyler öğrenmeye çalışıyorum. Konuşmanın nasıl seyredeceğini sen belirleyeceksin."
languages.original_text: "That... isn't what I said." {n}Heinrix looks down with a laugh.{/n} "I'm not looking for heresy or deviations from the Imperial Creed. I'm... trying to have a conversation. To learn about your life and what interests you. You can judge how well it's going for yourself."
